mapper.select: insert into review (userIdx, bookIdx, content, reviewAt) values(#{userIdx}, #{bookIdx}, #{content}, #{reviewAt})
select * from review where userIdx = #{userIdx} and bookIdx = #{bookIdx}
mapper.update: update review set content = #{content} where userIdx = #{userIdx} and bookIdx = #{bookIdx}
mapper.delete: delete from review where userIdx = #{userIdx} and bookIdx = #{bookIdx}
